name: Honor Arena
description:
Applause, cheers, scream...Here do they come from spectators constantly. This is the stage pursued by countless strong human beings for whole life. No matter for what, bonus, reputation or supreme honor. As long as you are eager to realize championship dream, come to battle in Honor Arena!
Fancy cartoon style. Simple game play. The player just needs to control the direction, jump and attack. Flexibly evade attacking by your rival and chase the time to hit back with a deadly blow!
